column1: Uchi////Japanese Sea Urchin (uni hokkaido): $12 It was our (boyfriend and I) first time trying this delicate....My boyfriend didn't really like it because it was too mushy. It looks like orange frosting decorated on a piece of sushi rice. I thought it tasted pretty good. Keep in mind that my boyfriend doesn't like mushy food in general. He doesn't like avocado
column3: and etc...I would still recommend you to try this dish!
